Item.sqlserver_body: CREATE FUNCTION EvaluatePermissionPropertyValue_ClassDefined ( @type VARCHAR(32), @xclass_id CHAR(32), @identity_list VARCHAR(MAX), @item_type_id CHAR(32) ) RETURNS TABLE AS RETURN ( SELECT MAX (CASE WHEN ( acs.can_update = '1' AND @type = 'can_update' ) THEN 9 -- can_update permissions only WHEN ( acs.can_get = '1' AND @type = 'can_get' ) THEN 9 -- can_delete permissions only WHEN ( acs.can_change_access = '1' AND @type = 'can_change_access' ) THEN 9 -- can_change_access permissions only ELSE NULL -- No permissions on specified for specified access right END) p FROM (SELECT acs.can_get, acs.can_update, acs.can_change_access from [innovator].[XCLASS_XPROPVALUE_PERM] xclass_perm INNER JOIN [ACCESS_PROPERTYVALUE] acs ON acs.SOURCE_ID = xclass_perm.RELATED_ID WHERE xclass_perm.SOURCE_ID = @xclass_id AND xclass_perm.ITEMTYPE_ID = @item_type_id AND (CHARINDEX(acs.[related_id] COLLATE Latin1_General_BIN2, @identity_list) > 0) ) acs )
Item.name: EvaluatePermissionPropertyValue_ClassDefined
